Params: {1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Tsk, it really is here. Sophia, report to the boss immediately!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'The Commoner Carriage that it was attached to...', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "All dead, probably... Ashlar's work, I reckon. We could've used an empty cart.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Hold on, there were people on that carriage?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Only the Babylonians make such weird names. They seem to be the "dealers" mentioned.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Then let us introduce ourselves. My name is Changyu.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "We're both working for the Akdilek Commercial Alliance.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Above the speeding train, two figures of similar height stand steadily amidst the roaring wind.'}
{3: 'You can still notice a hint of childlikeness on their faces, but their expressions reveal a deadly gravitas.'}
{3: 'Whether it is the massive robotic arm on her back, drastically contrasting her minuscule frame—'}
{3: '—Or the severed Corrupted limb that the other boy is carrying in his hand, you can tell that these two are more than meet the eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Surprised? The Construct technology is not a Babylonia exclusive.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Almost forgot about this fella. It's looking pissed!", 4: '1'}
